description: Query factory shopfloor graph for machines, sensors, operators, work orders, and maintenance logs.

highVibrationMachines.description: List machines whose linked sensors exceed a reading threshold.
highVibrationMachines.cypher: MATCH (m:Machine)-[:MONITORED_BY]->(s:Sensor) WHERE s.reading > $threshold AND s.unit = $unit RETURN m.id AS machineId, s.id AS sensorId, s.reading AS reading, s.timestamp AS at ORDER BY reading DESC

overdueWorkOrders.description: Find machines that have overdue work orders.
overdueWorkOrders.cypher: MATCH (m:Machine)-[:HAS_WORK_ORDER]->(w:WorkOrder) WHERE w.status = 'Overdue' RETURN m.id AS machineId, w.id AS workOrderId, w.scheduledTime AS due ORDER BY due ASC

currentOperator.description: Get the current operator for a machine.
currentOperator.cypher: MATCH (m:Machine {id: $machineId})- [r:OPERATED_BY]->(o:Operator) RETURN m.id AS machineId, o.id AS operatorId, o.name AS operatorName, r.shift AS shift

sensorsByZone.description: List sensors attached to machines located in a given zone.
sensorsByZone.cypher: MATCH (z:FacilityZone {id: $zoneId})<-[:LOCATED_IN]-(m:Machine)-[:MONITORED_BY]->(s:Sensor) RETURN z.id AS zoneId, m.id AS machineId, s.id AS sensorId, s.type AS sensorType, s.reading AS reading, s.unit AS unit

dueForMaintenance.description: Machines whose last maintenance is older than a cutoff datetime.
dueForMaintenance.cypher: MATCH (m:Machine) WHERE m.lastMaintenance < datetime($cutoff) RETURN m.id AS machineId, m.lastMaintenance AS lastMaintenance ORDER BY lastMaintenance ASC
